homepage.welcomeSubtitle: Manage your projects, materials, and suppliers in one place.
homepage.projectStatusDescription: Distribution of projects by their current status.
homepage.projectsFeatureDescription: Organize, track progress, and manage all aspects of your construction projects efficiently.
homepage.materialsFeatureDescription: Keep a detailed inventory of materials, manage stock levels, and track usage across projects.
homepage.suppliersFeatureDescription: Maintain a database of your suppliers, manage contacts, and track performance.
homepage.usersFeatureDescription: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions within the application.
